mapper.select:
SELECT c.id, c.themeId, t2.theme, c.content, t1.team, t1.company, t1.type, c.createName, c.createTime, c.updateName, c.updateTime FROM aqara.speedyteam t1, aqara.speedytheme t2, aqara.speedycontent c where t2.id = c.themeId and t1.id = t2.teamId
AND t2.theme like concat('%',#{theme,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
order by c.themeId
mapper.insert: insert into speedyContent ( themeId, content, createName, createTime, updateName, updateTime ) values ( #{themeId}, #{content}, #{createName}, NOW(), #{updateName}, NOW() )
update from speedyContent where id = #{id} set themeId = #{themeId} and content = #{content}
mapper.delete: delete from speedyContent where id in (#{id})
